Interface Controller

public interface Controller

This interface specifies the methods required to manage a Xanadu dome which consists of a number of caverns joined by one-way turnstiles.New users(passes)always start in the Outside cavern and may use their tokens to move to other caverns,provided conditions are met

Version:
18/10/12
Author:
A.A.Marczyk

Method Summary
 void addPass(Pass ps)
          Adds a pass to dome and places the pass in the "Outside" cavern
 boolean canEnter(Pass ps, int tNo)
          Returns true if a pass is allowed to enter through the turnstile, false otherwise.Entry can be made if: the rating of the pass >= the rating of the destination cavern AND the destination cavern is not full AND the pass has sufficient tokens AND the pass is currently in the source cavern
 void convertPoints(Pass ps)
          Converts a loyalty pass's loyalty points into tokens
 java.lang.String enterCavern(Pass ps, int tNo)
          Returns the result of a pass wanting to enter through a turnstile.Entry will be successful if: the rating of the pass >= the rating of the destination cavern AND the destination cavern is not full AND the pass has sufficient tokens AND the pass is currently in the source cavern If the turnstile allows entry, the pass is removed from the source cavern, added to the destination cavern and a suitable message returned.If the turnstile does not allow entry, the state of the system remains unchanged and a suitable message specifying the reason is returned.
 void evacuateAll()
          In an emergency, evacuates all passes directly back to the outside without affecting tokens or other information using emergency exits
 Cavern findPass(Pass ps)
          Returns the cavern which contains the specified pass
 Cavern getCavern(java.lang.String cavernName)
          Returns the cavern with the name specified by the parameter
 java.lang.String getDomeName()
          Returns the name of the dome
 Pass getPass(int id)
          Returns the pass with the id specified by the parameter
 Turnstile getTurnstile(int turnNo)
          Returns the turnstile with the number specified by the parameter
 java.lang.String goToOutside(Pass ps)
          Moves a pass directly to the outside without affecting tokens or other information and using emergency exits
 java.lang.String passesInAllCaverns()
          Returns a String representation of all the passes in all caverns (by cavern)
 java.lang.String passesInCavern(Cavern cvn)
          Returns a String representation of all the passes in the specified cavern
 void topUpTokens(Pass ps, int tkns)
          Allows a pass to top up its tokens.This method is not concerned with the cost of a token as charges may vary between facilities.
 

Method Detail

addPass

void addPass(Pass ps)
Adds a pass to dome and places the pass in the "Outside" cavern

Parameters:
ps - pass to be added

canEnter

boolean canEnter(Pass ps,
                 int tNo)
Returns true if a pass is allowed to enter through the turnstile, false otherwise.Entry can be made if: the rating of the pass >= the rating of the destination cavern AND the destination cavern is not full AND the pass has sufficient tokens AND the pass is currently in the source cavern

Parameters:
ps - is the pass requesting the move
tNo - is the number of the turnstile through which the pass wants to enter
Returns:
true if the pass can enter through the turnstile,else false

convertPoints

void convertPoints(Pass ps)
Converts a loyalty pass's loyalty points into tokens

Parameters:
ps - the pass whose points are to be converted

enterCavern

java.lang.String enterCavern(Pass ps,
                             int tNo)
Returns the result of a pass wanting to enter through a turnstile.Entry will be successful if: the rating of the pass >= the rating of the destination cavern AND the destination cavern is not full AND the pass has sufficient tokens AND the pass is currently in the source cavern If the turnstile allows entry, the pass is removed from the source cavern, added to the destination cavern and a suitable message returned.If the turnstile does not allow entry, the state of the system remains unchanged and a suitable message specifying the reason is returned.

Parameters:
ps - is the pass requesting to enter
tNo - is the number of the turnstile through which the pass wants to enter
Returns:
a String which includes pass id, pass name, name of destination cavern and giving the result of the request

evacuateAll

void evacuateAll()
In an emergency, evacuates all passes directly back to the outside without affecting tokens or other information using emergency exits

findPass

Cavern findPass(Pass ps)
Returns the cavern which contains the specified pass

Parameters:
ps - is the specified pass
Returns:
the Cavern which contains the pass

Cavern getCavern(java.lang.String cavernName)
Returns the cavern with the name specified by the parameter

Returns:
the cavern with the specified name

Returns the name of the dome

Returns:
name of the dome

getPass

Returns the pass with the id specified by the parameter

Returns:
the pass with the specified id

getTurnstile

Turnstile getTurnstile(int turnNo)
Returns the turnstile with the number specified by the parameter

Returns:
the turnstile with the specified number

goToOutside

java.lang.String goToOutside(Pass ps)
Moves a pass directly to the outside without affecting tokens or other information and using emergency exits

Returns:
a message giving the user's name and "to outside"

passesInAllCaverns

java.lang.String passesInAllCaverns()
Returns a String representation of all the passes in all caverns (by cavern)

Returns:
a String representation of all passes in all caverns

passesInCavern

java.lang.String passesInCavern(Cavern cvn)
Returns a String representation of all the passes in the specified cavern

Parameters:
cvn - the specified cavern
Returns:
a String representation of all passes in the Cavern

topUpTokens

void topUpTokens(Pass ps,
                 int tkns)
Allows a pass to top up its tokens.This method is not concerned with the cost of a token as charges may vary between facilities.

Parameters:
ps - the pass toping up its tokens
tkns - the number of tokens purchased to be added to the pass.
